sentence.Network_en: Effectiveness of acupuncture, either verum or sham, was almost twice that of conventional therapy.

list.exp: 八角茴香是常绿乔木八角

八角(学名：Illicium verum)，又称茴香、八角茴香、大料和大茴香。是八角茴香科八角属的一种植物。
